datafield.subfield: La prueba civil en un estado social y democrático de derecho, 2012:

t.p. (Rafael Barón Duluc Rijo) p. 2 of cover (doctor en Derecho de la Universidad Central del Este (UCE) desde el 1996. Diploma Universitario en Derecho Privado Francés, Europeo e Internacional con la Universite Panteón-Assas (Paris II))

(Dr. Rafael Baron Duluc Rijo, admitted to the Bar Association of the Dominican Republic in 1996. Vice Minister of Tourism of the Dominican Republic. Manager of Promotion and Development of Tourism. 2012-Present. Civil, governor of the province La Altagracia. 2010-2012. e is founding partner of the firm Duluc-Aybar & Corporán. 2003 ... Judge of Peace of the Municipality of Higuey, La Altagracia and Deputy Judge of the Civil and Commercial Chamber and Criminal Chamber of the Court of First Instance of the Judicial District of La Altagracia. 1998 until his resignation in 2003 ... e-mail: rafael.duluc@duluclawyer.com
